reference: Boskin (1975) Social Security and Retirement Decisions, National Bureau of Economic Research, Working Paper No. 107, Stanford.
Diamond, P.A. (1976) A Framework for Social Security Analysis, Journal of Political Economy (forthcoming).

Steiner, P. and R. Dorfman (1959) Ihe Economic Status of the Aged (University of California Press, Berkeley).
Yaari, M.E. (1964) On the Consumers Lifetime Allocation Process, International Economic Review, 5, 304-317.
